column4: I'm trying to setup apt-cacher-ng by following this tutorial: http://www.unix-tutorials.com/go.php?id=3997

But the line "$ echo ‘Acquire::http { Proxy “http://localhost:3142″; };’ | sudo tee /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/01proxy" which I blindly copy/paste into the terminal cuz I don't know any better gives me bash: syntax error near unexpected token `}' Does anyone know what I have to do to fix this line if it's just a typo?
Your long nick sux, though `` is one typo at least, I think.
